Current market prices

market_price.Rd

Current market prices

market_price(mid)

Arguments

mid

The integer market ID.

Format

A tibble with 7 variables:

time

The hour or day of price

mid

Market ID

market

Market question

cid

Contract ID

contract

Question answers

last

Most recent trading price of the contract

close

Price at the end of the previous midnight EST

Value

A data frame of market contracts prices.

Examples

market_price(mid = 3633)
#> # A tibble: 33 x 7
#>    time                  mid market                     cid contract  last close
#>    <dttm>              <int> <fct>                    <int> <fct>    <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee?  7725 Sanders   0.46  0.46
#>  2 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee? 13871 Bloombe…  0.23  0.23
#>  3 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee? 14769 Buttigi…  0.17  0.16
#>  4 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee?  7729 Biden     0.12  0.13
#>  5 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee?  7730 Warren    0.06  0.05
#>  6 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee?  7734 Klobuch…  0.05  0.04
#>  7 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee? 13491 Clinton   0.05  0.04
#>  8 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee? 14670 Yang      0.02  0.02
#>  9 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee?  7726 Booker    0.01  0.01
#> 10 2020-02-09 00:05:15  3633 2020 Democratic nominee?  7727 Harris    0.01  0.01
#> # … with 23 more rows
